title: Cyber Platformer Action Music Pack
description: Cyber Platformer Action is a high-quality pack of 10 intense rock/electronic hybrid music tracks, perfectly suited to exciting platformer games
longDescription:
Cyber Platformer Action contains 10 high-quality tracks of intense rock/electronic hybrid music, written with the cyberpunk genre in mind. Each track comes with its own unique set of read-made loops, prepared for use in any project, any genre, any time. Please see below for more details


TRACKLIST:


  1. Ownership [04:36]
  2. The Rights [05:19]
  3. Assimil(n)nation [04:16]
  4. The Future City Pt. 1 [03:56]
  5. It's In Your Hands [05:07]
  6. Digitally Corrupted [03:51]
  7. This Is Not The Answer [03:35]
  8. The Deed is Done [03:54]
  9. Hang In There [04:41]
  10. The Future City Pt. 2 [04:22]


LOOPS:


  1. Ownership - 4 Loops
  2. The Rights - 5 Loops
  3. Assimil(n)nation - 4 Loops
  4. The Future City Pt. 1 - 3 Loops
  5. It's In Your Hands - 3 Loops
  6. Digitally Corrupted - 4 Loops
  7. This Is Not The Answer - 4 Loops
  8. The Deed is Done - 4 Loops
  9. Hang In There - 4 Loops
  10. The Future City Pt. 2 - 4 Loops


This pack is a reworking of Jake Bradford-Sharp's album Nighttown 2. More information relating to the product can be found here, wherein you'll find the tracks included in this pack in their album format and the original Nigthtown album.


Jake is available for bespoke and custom work and is also available for custom edits on this pack. Please contact Jake directly at info@jakebradford-sharp.com or via his website for more information
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 49 total

Number of full Audio Tracks: 10

Number of Audio Loops: 39

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit, 44.1 kHz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 57 minutes, 37 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation

Important/Additional Notes: https://jakebradford-sharp.com/nighttown
